DOC.brief_summary: Our aim is to compare the effects of 80% and 40% Fraction of inspired oxygen on oxidative stress, antioxidant response (in plasma and bronchoalveolar lavage), extubation quality, preanesthetic and postanesthetic expiration tidal volumes.
DOC.brief_title: Hyperoxic Oxidative Stress During Abdominal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing abdominal surgery, between 2060 years old, with American Society of Anesthesiology score I or II Patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease, Diabetes Mellitus, musclebone diseases, inflammatory bowel diseases and patients with malnutrition. Patients will be recruited through general surgery service of our hospital
